name: Gangster Pistol - Aim your Weapon to Defend your City
name_original: Gangster Pistol - Aim your Weapon to Defend your City
description:
“Fast paced Gameplay”
“Beautiful Graphics”
“Awesome music”
___________________________________

Gang war has begun! The city life has been spoiled by these gangsters, and city calls for its rescuer. Gangster Pistol is an exciting iPad game where you need to volunteer the smooth out city streets from the mafia gangster groups. Use your favourite pistol to shoot these mafia gangsters and save your city.

If you like shooting or action games, Gangster Pistol is the perfect one to have in your IOS device. Pull out your pistol, aim and shoot the gangsters. Shoot as fast as possible or they will kill you. Play online and contend with your mates. Enjoy!

+++ GAME FEATURES +++
Fast paced Gameplay
Amazing graphics
Large number of enemies
Simple control system
